item.description:
Since this idea had quite a bit of interest, I'm posting it!

Warrior Dash is the ultimate event for thrill-seeking athletes. This running series is held on some of the nation's most demanding and unique terrain. Participants will conquer extreme obstacles and celebrate their feat with music, beer, warrior helmets and muddy shorts.

Every participant will go home with some sweet gear:

1.Warrior helmet (pictured)
2.Warrior Dash shirt (pictured)
3.Custom Warrior medals (pictured)

Costumes are encouraged! All the craziest costumes will be called on stage and the audience will vote for Craziest Costume by loudest applause. The best costume will win a gift card prize.

The top three times in each age division for males and females win a steel warrior helmet trophy.

The top three overall times for both males and females will win a custom engraved steel warrior helmet.

The top overall male and female finishers will also receive the ‘True Strength Award’, sponsored by Optimum Nutrition, valued at $150 in sports supplements and merchandise.

The top male and female finishers in each age group will receive the ‘Optimum Performance Award’, sponsored by Optimum Nutrition, valued at $75 in sports supplements and merchandise


Windham Mountain
33 Clarence D Lane Rd
Windham, NY 12496-5516
(518) 734-4300

Price:
$65 until 11:59pm on August 2, 2010
$75 until 11:59pm on August 23, 2010
$85 until 3:00pm on September 7, 2010


Absolutely no registration will be accepted after 3pm on September 7, 2010

Lodging accomodations are at Windham Mountain. www.windhammountain.com/lodging or call 800-754-9463. I would recommend we share rooms to cut down on costs.
item.name: Warrior Dash
